thread.title: Sheridan Smith’s new BBC drama about Shannon Matthews is SLAMMED by the abducted schoolgirl’s relatives who brand it a ‘disgrace’
thread.title_full: Sheridan Smith’s new BBC drama about Shannon Matthews is SLAMMED by the abducted schoolgirl’s relatives who brand it a ‘disgrace’

author: kcain
title: Sheridan Smith’s new BBC drama about Shannon Matthews is SLAMMED by the abducted schoolgirl’s relatives who brand it a ‘disgrace’
text:
Opinion 'IT'S SICK AND DISGUSTING' Sheridan Smith’s new BBC drama about Shannon Matthews is SLAMMED by the abducted schoolgirl’s relatives who brand it a ‘disgrace’ 
The young girl's grandparents are upset the drama is even appearing on television and say they won't be watching it By KATHRYN CAIN
